required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Investigating the Effectiveness of a Seasonal Influenza Vaccination Promotion Campaign for Members of a Non-Profit, Community-Based Health Insurance Plan: 2018-2019
clinical_study.official_title: Investigating the Effectiveness of a Seasonal Influenza Vaccination Promotion Campaign for Members of a Non-Profit, Community-Based Health Insurance Plan: 2018-2019

lead_sponsor.agency: The University of Texas Health Science Center at Tyler

clinical_study.source: The University of Texas Health Science Center at Tyler

brief_summary.textblock: â€¢ This study will assess the effect of promotional messaging and incentives encouraging influenza vaccination in the Sendero IdealCare policy holders during the 2018-2019 Flu Season. The intervention will consist of influenza vaccination promotion/reminders from Sendero Health Plans to subscribers, including text messages, emails, and tailored direct mail outs, i.e. postcard or a personalized letter, and incentive. The study population consists of approximately 22,500 subscribers enrolled in Sendero IdealCare Plan. The intervention will last approximately four months. The primary endpoints, assessed through administrative claims data, will be getting a flu shot during the 2018-2019 season. Data collected through this study will be used to determine effective components of influenza vaccination promotion campaigns used by a health insurance plan.

primary_outcome.description: Receipt of an influenza vaccination documented by medical or pharmacy claim.

arm_group.description: Group will be sent flu vaccine promotion messages via text, email and U.S. Mail
Group will be sent flu vaccine promotion messages via text, email and U.S. Mail, and will be eligible to receive a gift card as incentive for receiving flu vaccine

intervention.description: The participants will receive influenza promotion emails, text messages, and U.S. mail from Sendero Health Plans.
Participants will be eligible for a gift card to a local grocery store chain as an incentive for obtaining an influenza vaccine

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Enrollment in Sendero IdealCare health plan as of August 1, 2018
- Age 18 years or older
Exclusion Criteria:
- A coverage termination date listed prior to December 31, 2018.
- Sendero member records lack both a phone number and email address.

facility.name: The University of Texas System Population Health

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: The University of Texas Health Science Center at Tyler
